Ahh yes, the old straight-to-the-point school "Hi! *HYPNOSIS* into... *mind control fuck* then, Bye!" approach, huh? Truly a classic, reminds me of another classical use of this particular story structure mechanic which basically goes like this -> https://nhentai.net/g/121119/4/

Bonus points for the NTR, harem romcoms type japanime shows where they drag out the "will they-won't they" crap with generic characters such as the typical jap MC and the super shiny one in an author's wishfulfilling dream girl written deliberately for his own (obviously not a self-insert)MC are perfect material to be put on the NTR chopping block. It also gets whoresome types vanillafags' blood boiling and spilling over the comment section, which is an added bonus because let's face it, they're absolute clowns who can't figure out how to blacklist the NTR tag they so deeply, fervently despise (or they don't want to blacklist because they're masochists and enjoy getting upset to drama queen over it).

@abab In case you didn't knew yet, this site is basically an aggregator site of e-hentai/exhentai, that's where most translator and original uploader are, this site probably rips their release with bots, including its title and tags, that's where the "|" thingy from, its recently implemented on exhentai. On exhentai, its actually working whenever you hover your cursor it slides, so you can view its alternative translated tag, or artist's other alias.
Why do you have to do this?

I have to ask. What's with the "|" in the title (bisque doll wa koi o suru | my dress-up darling 1) ? Or maybe it's another thin, I don't know.

Why do they do that? So many parodies or characters with that "|" in them and they are all unsearchable. It's so annoying.

Illustration is goodshit. Story is meh. Mates, I'm kinda sad for all these wasted works of these amazing artists. 
Idc if it's cheating, rape, loli, shota, feet, necrophilia, or whatever other weird kink there is. Be it parody or original. As long as the story is more compelling, it'll have the potential to ascend in meme realm like 177013. This meta of hypno-ntr/hypno-rape plot scheme without other info to spice up the art. It's getting pretty old.
The demographic that'll still bust their nut for this overused are virgins who have no confidence that they'll have a shot to fuck a person... Which is the majority of the consumer in this industry so I guess it can't be helped.... Goddammit.

Bruh, can anyone atleast recommend me something in their library with both good illustration and story?
